insert into saas_purchase_order_detail (id, enterprise_id, parent_id, order_id, order_type, order_code, order_date, base_order_dtl_id, base_order_id, base_order_type, base_order_code, base_order_date, goods_id, goods_code, barcode, goods_name, goods_generic_name, dosage_id, dosage_name, unit_id, unit_name, goods_specification, manufacturer_id, manufacturer, goods_place, approval_number, quantity, unit_price, distr_price, retail_price, member_price, line_discount, amount, whole_discount, line_discount_amount, real_price, real_amount, tax_rate, tax_rate_id, notax_real_price, notax_real_amount, tax_amount, unclear_quantity, clear_quantity, line_num, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time) VALUES
( #{list.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{list.baseOrderDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.baseOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.baseOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.baseOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.baseOrderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{list.goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.goodsGenericName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.dosageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.dosageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.goodsSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.manufacturerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.goodsPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.approvalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.distrPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.memberPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.lineDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.wholeDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.lineDiscountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.realPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.taxRateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.notaxRealPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.notaxRealAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.taxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.unclearQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.clearQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{list.lineNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{list.modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{list.modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.goods_id AS goodsId, a.goods_code AS goodsCode, a.barcode, a.goods_name AS goodsName, a.goods_generic_name AS goodsGenericName, a.dosage_id AS dosageId, a.dosage_name AS dosageName, a.unit_id AS unitId, a.unit_name AS unitName, a.goods_specification AS goodsSpecification, a.manufacturer_id AS manufacturerId, a.manufacturer, a.goods_place AS goodsPlace, a.approval_number AS approvalNumber, a.quantity, a.unit_price AS unitPrice, a.line_discount AS lineDiscount, a.amount, a.tax_rate_id AS taxRateId, a.tax_rate AS taxRate, a.notax_real_price AS notaxRealPrice, a.notax_real_amount AS notaxRealAmount, a.tax_amount AS taxAmount, goods.special_drug AS specialDrug FROM saas_purchase_order_detail a JOIN saas_goods goods ON a.`goods_id` = goods.id where a.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} and a.order_id=#{orderId} limit ${pageNo},${pageSize}
